name: No Future- Digital Bouncer
description:
No Future- Digital Bouncer, 2022, Video, 21s

Ever wish you were somewhere else?  Today, we are perpetually confronted with images of places where we want to be, and places where we are not invited.  I was inspired by the concept of FOMO (fear of missing out) brought on by our desire to record everything and share it on social media.  
This piece is from the "No Future" series of digital work. It examines our daily lives and socialization in the digital world. See more at www.laladrona.com
